judges: Before Bell, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellants.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edward R. Carpenter, with him L. Pierre Teillon, Jr., J. Brooke Aker, Dechert, Price & Rhoads, and Smith, Aker, Grossman & Hollinger, for appellants.
John H. Wood, Jr., with him Henry Stuckert Miller, and Wood and Floge, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Cobb Estate.
Argued April 30, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Edward R. Carpenter, with him L. Pierre Teillon, Jr., J. Brooke Aker, Dechert, Price & Rhoads, and Smith, Aker, Grossman & Hollinger, for appellants.
John H. Wood, Jr., with him Henry Stuckert Miller, and Wood and Floge, for appellee.
October 12, 1971:
